title: Amazing Group T-206 Related Cigarette Packs For Sale - Individual or Lot - SOLD
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Amazing Group T-206 Related Cigarette Packs For Sale - Individual or Lot - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jon Canfield
American Beauty - 10 count slide and shell pack complete with inner slide.  Partial tax stamp with overprinting on back.  Overprinting cannot be read. EXTREMELY DIFFICULT pack to find - $250.00
[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/abfront.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/Abback.jpg[/IMG]

Broadleaf - 15 count slide and shell pack with inner slide and 10 cigarettes!  No tax stamp but dates between 1910 and 1917.  The nicest condition Broadleaf out of the 5 known to exist.  IMPOSSIBLE TO FIND - $950.00
[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/broadleaffront.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/broadleafback.jpg[/IMG]

El Principe De Gales - complete clam shell box with both halves.  1901 tax stamp with April 11, 1910 overprinting.  Pack manufactured at Factory 17, 2d Va meaning this pack almost certainly HELD A CARD.  DIFFICULT to locate - $200.00
[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/epdgfront.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/EPDGback.jpg[/IMG]

Piedmont - 10 count slide and shell pack complete with inner slide.  Partial 1910 tax stamp on end. Pack manufactured at Factory 25, 2d Va meaning this pack almost certainly HELD A CARD.  DIFFICULT to locate correct 1910 packs - $110.00
[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/piedmontfront.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/Piedmont.jpg[/IMG]

Sweet Caporal - 10 count slide and shell pack complete with inner slide.  Partial 1901 tax stamp on back with Sep 1, 1906 overprint. Pack manufactured at Factory 30, 2d NY  - $80.00
[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/SCfront.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/SCback.jpg[/IMG]

If you are interested in acquiring this whole collection - all packs can be had for SOLD.
